title: Prompt
body:
$ ls
bin
dev
usr
> 
-> cd bin
   [[Bin]]
-> cd dev
   [[Dev]]
-> cd usr
   [[Usr]]
-> DEBUG <<if $debug is true>>
   [[DEBUG]]

title: Qux
body:
<<start DoomClock 30>>

Ooooh, Qux

...there's something you 
should know about qux...

Hope you can get out!

[[./qux|Qux]]
[[./quxit|Quxit]]

title: Dev
body:
$ ls
led
>
-> ./led 0 0 <<if $computer_led_1 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_1 to false>>
    LED0 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> ./led 0 1 <<if $computer_led_1 is false>>
    <<set $computer_led_1 to true>>
    LED0 state: enabled
    [[Dev]]
-> ./led 1 0 <<if $computer_led_2 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_2 to false>>
    LED1 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> ./led 1 1 <<if $computer_led_2 is false>>
    <<set $computer_led_2 to true>>
    LED1 state: enabled
    [[Dev]]
-> ./led 2 0 <<if $computer_led_3 is true>>
    <<set $computer_led_3 to false>>
    LED2 state: disabled
    [[Dev]]
-> ./led 2 1 <<if $computer_led_3 is false>>
   <<set $computer_led_3 to true>>
    LED2 state: enabled
   [[Dev]]
-> cd ..
   [[Prompt]]

title: Usr.Root
body:
$ ls
passwords.txt.enc
>
-> hack passwords.txt.enc <<if $path_set is 1>>
    [[Hack1]]
-> cd ..
   [[Usr]]

title: Pokemans
body:
Pokemans.exe
============

Must identify and catalogue
every Pokeman!

<<set $visited_pokemans to 1>>
[[Usr.Guest]]

title: Usr.Guest
body:
$ ls
pokemans.exe
<<if $hacked_pokemans is 1>>
pokemans.hacked.exe
<<endif>>
>
-> ./pokemans.exe
    [[Pokemans]]
-> hack ./pokemans.exe <<if $path_set is 1 and $visited_pokemans is 1 and $hacked_pokemans is 0>>
    <<set $hacked_pokemans to 1>>
    [[Usr.Guest]]
-> ./pokemans.hacked.exe <<if $hacked_pokemans is 1>>
    [[Pokemans.Hacked]]
-> cd ..
   [[Usr]]

title: Bin
body:
$ ls 
qux
hack
>
-> ./qux
    [[Qux]]
-> ./hack
    Nothing to hack! Maybe add to $PATH?
    <<set $show_path_set to 1>>
    [[Bin]]
-> export PATH=$PATH:/bin <<if $path_set is 0 and $show_path_set is 1>>
    Done.
    <<set $path_set to 1>>
    [[Bin]]
-> cd ..
    [[Prompt]]

title: DEBUG
body:
-> Toggle Debug State Display
   <<toggle DebugTextView>>
   [[DEBUG]]
-> Back
   [[Prompt]]
